title: Unable to set my Pixel 3 ringtone after updating Android OS to version 11.
content:
I'm unable to set my pixel's ringtone. Whenever I click on "phone ringtone" option nothing happens. It keeps on redirecting to the pixel's main setting options or it hows the message that "sound keeps stopping".
This is happen since I upgrade the Android OS to version 11.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
